lyrics.text:
Kapau ‘oku ue’i au,
‘E he me’a ‘o māmani,
Ke u hoko ai ki he ngāue,
‘Eiki, ‘oku ke ‘ilo’i!

Ko e ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi,
‘Oku fa’a ue’i au;
Ke u kumi, ke fakahaofi,
‘A e kāinga kuo hē.

Kau fa’a fai, pea u tangi,
Pea u feinga ke u hamusi;
‘A e ngaahi laumālie,
Mei he luo ko heli.

Kapau ‘e manuki’i au,
‘I he me’a ‘oku ou fai;
‘Eiki, ke ke tokoni au,
Pea u fie mālie ai.

Pea kapau ‘oku ‘aonga,
‘Eiki, ki ho’o ngāue,
‘Eku mo’ui ko eni,
Ke ke fa’iteliha ki ai.

‘I he’eku ma’u tokoni,
‘Eiki, ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Pea u ngāue fai ma’u ai pē
Ko ho fakamo’oni au.
